verses.verse: Against Moab <S%H4124><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> Woe <S%H1945><s%> to Nebo! <S%H5015><s%> for it is spoiled: <S%H7703><s%> Kiriathaim <S%H7156><s%> is confounded <S%H3001><s%> and taken: <S%H3920><s%> Misgab <S%H4869><s%> is confounded <S%H3001><s%> and dismayed. <S%H2865><s%>

There shall be no <S%H369><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> praise <S%H8416><s%> of Moab: <S%H4124><s%> in Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> they have devised <S%H2803><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> it; come, <S%H3212><s%> and let us cut <S%H3772><s%> it off from being a nation. <S%H1471><s%> Also <S%H1571><s%> you shall be cut <S%H1826><s%> down, O Madmen; <S%H4086><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%> shall pursue <S%H3212><s%> you.
A voice <S%H6963><s%> of crying <S%H6818><s%> shall be from Horonaim, <S%H2773><s%> spoiling <S%H7701><s%> and great <S%H1419><s%> destruction. <S%H7667><s%>
Moab <S%H4124><s%> is destroyed; <S%H7665><s%> her little <S%H6810><s%> ones have caused a cry <S%H2201><s%> to be heard. <S%H8085><s%>

For in the going <S%H4608><s%> up of Luhith <S%H3872><s%> continual weeping <S%H1065><s%> shall go <S%H5927><s%> up; for in the going <S%H4174><s%> down <S%H4174><s%> of Horonaim <S%H2773><s%> the enemies <S%H6862><s%> have heard <S%H8085><s%> a cry <S%H6818><s%> of destruction. <S%H7667><s%>
Flee, <S%H5127><s%> save <S%H4422><s%> your lives, <S%H5315><s%> and be like the heath <S%H6176><s%> in the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>

For because <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3282><s%> you have trusted <S%H982><s%> in your works <S%H4639><s%> and in your treasures, <S%H214><s%> you shall also <S%H1571><s%> be taken: <S%H3920><s%> and Chemosh <S%H3645><s%> shall go <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> into captivity <S%H1473><s%> with his priests <S%H3548><s%> and his princes <S%H8269><s%> together. <S%H3162><s%>

And the spoiler <S%H7703><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> on every <S%H3605><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%> and no <S%H3808><s%> city <S%H5892><s%> shall escape: <S%H4422><s%> the valley <S%H6010><s%> also shall perish, <S%H6><s%> and the plain <S%H4334><s%> shall be destroyed, <S%H8045><s%> as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has spoken. <S%H559><s%>

Give <S%H5414><s%> wings <S%H6731><s%> to Moab, <S%H4124><s%> that it may flee <S%H5323><s%> and get <S%H3318><s%> away: <S%H3318><s%> for the cities <S%H5892><s%> thereof shall be desolate, <S%H8047><s%> without <S%H369><s%> any to dwell <S%H3427><s%> therein. <S%H2004><s%>

Cursed <S%H779><s%> be he that does <S%H6213><s%> the work <S%H4399><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> deceitfully, <S%H7423><s%> and cursed <S%H779><s%> be he that keeps <S%H4513><s%> back <S%H4513><s%> his sword <S%H2719><s%> from blood. <S%H1818><s%>

Moab <S%H4124><s%> has been at ease <S%H7599><s%> from his youth, <S%H5271><s%> and he has settled <S%H8252><s%> on <S%H413><s%> his lees, <S%H8105><s%> and has not been emptied <S%H7324><s%> from vessel <S%H3627><s%> to vessel, <S%H3627><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> has he gone <S%H1980><s%> into captivity: <S%H1473><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> his taste <S%H2940><s%> remained <S%H5975><s%> in him, and his scent <S%H7381><s%> is not changed. <S%H4171><s%>

Therefore, <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> come, <S%H935><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> that I will send <S%H7971><s%> to him wanderers, <S%H6808><s%> that shall cause him to wander, <S%H6808><s%> and shall empty <S%H7324><s%> his vessels, <S%H3627><s%> and break <S%H5310><s%> their bottles. <S%H5035><s%>

And Moab <S%H4124><s%> shall be ashamed <S%H954><s%> of Chemosh, <S%H3645><s%> as the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> was ashamed <S%H954><s%> of Bethel <S%H1008><s%> their confidence. <S%H4009><s%>
How <S%H349><s%> say <S%H559><s%> you, We are mighty <S%H1368><s%> and strong <S%H2428><s%> men <S%H582><s%> for the war? <S%H4421><s%>

Moab <S%H4124><s%> is spoiled, <S%H7703><s%> and gone <S%H5927><s%> up out of her cities, <S%H5892><s%> and his chosen <S%H4005><s%> young <S%H970><s%> men are gone <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the slaughter, <S%H2874><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the King, <S%H4428><s%> whose name <S%H8034><s%> is the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts. <S%H6635><s%>
The calamity <S%H343><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> is near <S%H7138><s%> to come, <S%H935><s%> and his affliction <S%H7451><s%> hastens <S%H4116><s%> fast. <S%H3966><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> you that are about <S%H5439><s%> him, bemoan <S%H5110><s%> him; and all <S%H3605><s%> you that know <S%H3045><s%> his name, <S%H8034><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> How <S%H349><s%> is the strong <S%H5797><s%> staff <S%H4294><s%> broken, <S%H7665><s%> and the beautiful <S%H8597><s%> rod! <S%H4731><s%>

You daughter <S%H1323><s%> that do inhabit <S%H3427><s%> Dibon, <S%H1769><s%> come <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from your glory, <S%H3519><s%> and sit <S%H3427><s%> in thirst; <S%H6772><s%> for the spoiler <S%H7703><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> shall come <S%H5927><s%> on you, and he shall destroy <S%H7843><s%> your strong <S%H4013><s%> holds. <S%H4013><s%>

O inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> of Aroer, <S%H6177><s%> stand <S%H5975><s%> by the way, <S%H1870><s%> and espy; <S%H6822><s%> ask <S%H7592><s%> him that flees, <S%H5127><s%> and her that escapes, <S%H4422><s%> and say, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> is done?

Moab <S%H4124><s%> is confounded; <S%H3001><s%> for it is broken <S%H2865><s%> down: howl <S%H3213><s%> and cry; <S%H2199><s%> tell <S%H5046><s%> you it in Arnon, <S%H769><s%> that Moab <S%H4124><s%> is spoiled, <S%H7703><s%>
And judgment <S%H4941><s%> is come <S%H935><s%> on the plain <S%H4334><s%> country; <S%H776><s%> on Holon, <S%H2473><s%> and on Jahazah, <S%H3096><s%> and on Mephaath, <S%H4158><s%>
And on Dibon, <S%H1769><s%> and on Nebo, <S%H5015><s%> and on Bethdiblathaim, <S%H1015><s%>
And on Kiriathaim, <S%H7156><s%> and on Bethgamul, <S%H1014><s%> and on Bethmeon, <S%H1010><s%>
And on Kerioth, <S%H7152><s%> and on Bozrah, <S%H1224><s%> and on all <S%H3605><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> far <S%H7350><s%> or near. <S%H7138><s%>
The horn <S%H7161><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> is cut <S%H1438><s%> off, and his arm <S%H2220><s%> is broken, <S%H7665><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Make you him drunken: <S%H7937><s%> for he magnified <S%H1431><s%> himself against <S%H5921><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> Moab <S%H4124><s%> also shall wallow <S%H5606><s%> in his vomit, <S%H6892><s%> and he also <S%H1571><s%> shall be in derision. <S%H7814><s%>

For was not Israel <S%H3478><s%> a derision <S%H7814><s%> to you? was he found <S%H4672><s%> among thieves? <S%H1590><s%> for since <S%H1767><s%> you spoke <S%H1697><s%> of him, you skipped <S%H5110><s%> for joy. <S%H8342><s%>

O you that dwell <S%H3427><s%> in Moab, <S%H4124><s%> leave <S%H5800><s%> the cities, <S%H5892><s%> and dwell <S%H7931><s%> in the rock, <S%H5553><s%> and be like the dove <S%H3123><s%> that makes her nest <S%H7077><s%> in the sides <S%H5676><s%> of the hole's <S%H6354><s%> mouth. <S%H6310><s%>

We have heard <S%H8085><s%> the pride <S%H1347><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> (he is exceeding <S%H3966><s%> proud) <S%H1343><s%> his loftiness, <S%H1363><s%> and his arrogance, <S%H1347><s%> and his pride, <S%H1347><s%> and the haughtiness <S%H7312><s%> of his heart. <S%H3820><s%>

I know <S%H3045><s%> his wrath, <S%H5678><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> but it shall not be so; <S%H3651><s%> his lies <S%H907><s%> shall not so <S%H3651><s%> effect <S%H6213><s%> it.

Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> will I howl <S%H3213><s%> for Moab, <S%H4124><s%> and I will cry <S%H2199><s%> out for all <S%H3605><s%> Moab; <S%H4124><s%> my heart shall mourn <S%H1897><s%> for the men <S%H582><s%> of Kirheres. <S%H7025><s%>

O vine <S%H1612><s%> of Sibmah, <S%H7643><s%> I will weep <S%H1058><s%> for you with the weeping <S%H1065><s%> of Jazer: <S%H3270><s%> your plants <S%H5189><s%> are gone <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> the sea, <S%H3220><s%> they reach <S%H5060><s%> even to the sea <S%H3220><s%> of Jazer: <S%H3270><s%> the spoiler <S%H7703><s%> is fallen <S%H5307><s%> on your summer <S%H7019><s%> fruits and on your vintage. <S%H1210><s%>

And joy <S%H8057><s%> and gladness <S%H8057><s%> is taken <S%H622><s%> from the plentiful <S%H3759><s%> field, and from the land <S%H776><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> and I have caused wine <S%H3196><s%> to fail <S%H7673><s%> from the winepresses: <S%H3342><s%> none <S%H3808><s%> shall tread <S%H1869><s%> with shouting; <S%H1959><s%> their shouting <S%H1959><s%> shall be no <S%H3808><s%> shouting. <S%H1959><s%>

From the cry <S%H2201><s%> of Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> even to Elealeh, <S%H500><s%> and even to Jahaz, <S%H3096><s%> have they uttered <S%H5414><s%> their voice, <S%H6963><s%> from Zoar <S%H6820><s%> even to Horonaim, <S%H2773><s%> as an heifer <S%H5697><s%> of three <S%H7992><s%> years old: <S%H7992><s%> for the waters <S%H4325><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> of Nimrim <S%H5249><s%> shall be desolate. <S%H4923><s%>

Moreover I will cause to cease <S%H7673><s%> in Moab, <S%H4124><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> him that offers <S%H5927><s%> in the high <S%H1116><s%> places, and him that burns <S%H6999><s%> incense <S%H6999><s%> to his gods. <S%H430><s%>

Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> my heart <S%H3820><s%> shall sound <S%H1993><s%> for Moab <S%H4124><s%> like pipes, <S%H2485><s%> and my heart <S%H3820><s%> shall sound <S%H1993><s%> like pipes <S%H2485><s%> for the men <S%H582><s%> of Kirheres: <S%H7025><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> the riches <S%H3502><s%> that he has gotten <S%H6213><s%> are perished. <S%H6><s%>

For every <S%H3605><s%> head <S%H7218><s%> shall be bald, <S%H7144><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> beard <S%H2206><s%> clipped: <S%H1639><s%> on all <S%H3605><s%> the hands <S%H3027><s%> shall be cuttings, <S%H1417><s%> and on the loins <S%H4975><s%> sackcloth. <S%H8242><s%>

There shall be lamentation <S%H4553><s%> generally <S%H3605><s%> on all <S%H3605><s%> the housetops <S%H1406><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> and in the streets <S%H7339><s%> thereof: for I have broken <S%H7665><s%> Moab <S%H4124><s%> like a vessel <S%H3627><s%> wherein is no <S%H369><s%> pleasure, <S%H2656><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

They shall howl, <S%H3213><s%> saying, How <S%H349><s%> is it broken <S%H2865><s%> down! how <S%H349><s%> has Moab <S%H4124><s%> turned <S%H6437><s%> the back <S%H6203><s%> with shame! <S%H954><s%> so shall Moab <S%H4124><s%> be a derision <S%H7814><s%> and a dismaying <S%H4288><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> them about <S%H5439><s%> him.

For thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> he shall fly <S%H1675><s%> as an eagle, <S%H5404><s%> and shall spread <S%H6566><s%> his wings <S%H3671><s%> over <S%H413><s%> Moab. <S%H4124><s%>

Kerioth <S%H7152><s%> is taken, <S%H3920><s%> and the strong <S%H4679><s%> holds <S%H4679><s%> are surprised, <S%H8610><s%> and the mighty <S%H1368><s%> men's hearts <S%H3820><s%> in Moab <S%H4124><s%> at that day <S%H3117><s%> shall be as the heart <S%H3820><s%> of a woman <S%H802><s%> in her pangs. <S%H6887><s%>

And Moab <S%H4124><s%> shall be destroyed <S%H8045><s%> from being a people, <S%H5971><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> <S%H5921><s%> he has magnified <S%H1431><s%> himself against <S%H5921><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
Fear, <S%H6343><s%> and the pit, <S%H6354><s%> and the snare, <S%H6341><s%> shall be on you, O inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

He that flees <S%H5211><s%> from the fear <S%H6343><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the pit; <S%H6354><s%> and he that gets <S%H5927><s%> up out of the pit <S%H6354><s%> shall be taken <S%H3920><s%> in the snare: <S%H6341><s%> for I will bring <S%H935><s%> on it, even on Moab, <S%H4124><s%> the year <S%H8141><s%> of their visitation, <S%H6486><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

They that fled <S%H5127><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> under the shadow <S%H6738><s%> of Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> because of the force: <S%H3581><s%> but a fire <S%H784><s%> shall come <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> and a flame <S%H3852><s%> from the middle of Sihon, <S%H5511><s%> and shall devour <S%H398><s%> the corner <S%H6285><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> and the crown <S%H6936><s%> of the head <S%H6936><s%> of the tumultuous <S%H1121><s%> <S%H7588><s%> ones. <S%H1121><s%>

Woe <S%H188><s%> be to you, O Moab! <S%H4124><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of Chemosh <S%H3645><s%> perishes: <S%H6><s%> for your sons <S%H1121><s%> are taken <S%H3947><s%> captives, <S%H7628><s%> and your daughters <S%H1323><s%> captives. <S%H7633><s%>

Yet will I bring <S%H7725><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> the captivity <S%H7622><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> in the latter <S%H319><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%> Thus <S%H2008><s%> far <S%H2008><s%> is the judgment <S%H4941><s%> of Moab. <S%H4124><s%>
